About Me

Hi I am Jose Vines,
Astronomy PhD. candidate at university of Chile. Looking for exoworlds by observing the spectra of stars. I do most, if not all, of my science with Python. I’m also very much into photography, especially nature photography, landscapes and such.

Experience

I did my undergraduate bachelors degree in astronomy at Universidad de Chile.

Student, Universidad de Chile, Astronomy PhD.

2018 — present

I'm currently doing my PhD in astronomy at Universidad de Chile. My research focuses on the discovery and characterization of exoplanets, mainly using the radial-velocity method.
